Manager contract¶

contract Manager is Ownable

Manager of markets groups

address public token

Address of the token

event AddedGroup(address dso, address token)

A group has been added

Parameters:
  • dso – The DSO wallet
  • token – The NemoGrid token address
constructor(address _token)
 public

Constructor

Parameters:
  • _token – The NemoGrid token address
function addGroup(address _dso)
 onlyOwner
 public

Add a markets group, defined by the couple (dso, token)

Parameters:
  • _dso – The DSO wallet
function getFlag(address _dso)
 view
 public
 returns (bool)

Return if the markets group exists

Parameters:
  • _dso – The DSO wallet
Return:

true if the group exists, false otherwise
